Articles.Content:
Hi! This is a simple and pretty Mig 21 replica, it comes with 2 external fuel tanks.

CONTROLS

-1 toggle engine

-2 toggle air intake

-4 jettison tanks

-0 toggle ladder

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/JPiI0)

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/j5dyv6h1djsc32v/Mig_21_By_Eorin_1_0.craft)
Very clean looking build man. Good job!

> 
> Very clean looking build man. Good job!

Thx man, i think it could be better tho but i can work on it later =)
